channel.title: New way for jagex to fake ban
channel.description:
05-Jun-2006 Legacy Punishment Not Appealable Why? No Evidence
This entry relates to an offence which was committed before the launch of our new offence history system on 6th June 2006.
This means that no detailed information is available for this offence. Any offences committed after 6th June 2006 will display more detailed information here.
6 MONTHS after the report i get a warning and happens to be ONE day before the fucking detailed info came out jagex is retarded if they want me banned they should just come out and say it.

item.title: New way for jagex to fake ban
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

That is gay. This is just a cheap ass way for Jagex to not have to auto-respond to a few messages.

What retards.

Read full topic
